title: Choegowi
text: The Choegowi (; literally "Top Position") was a <a href="Go%20%28board%20game%29">Go</a> competition that ran from 1959 to 1997. The preliminary stages were 8-player knockout rounds, with the players who won the preliminary split into two sections. The winners of those sections played a best-of-three match to decide who would challenge the holder of the title. The final was played in a best-of-five format. The thinking time was 5 hours, and <a href="Komidashi">komi</a> was 5.5 points.
